channel.title: The Best Music
channel.itunes:subtitle: hear it, see it, feel it
channel.itunes:author: Matt Schwartz

item.title: Dark New Day-Brother
item.description: This week's song of the week is Brother by Dark New Day. I encourage to buy all of Dark New Day's music, it is awesome. I hope you guys enjoy the song and I apologize for not posting a podcast for so long. Matt EMAIL-freakedoutmatt@gmail.com AIM-freakedoutmatt2

item.title: Mudvayne-Forget to Remember
item.description: This weeks song of the week is Forget to Remember by Mudvayne. Enjoy the song and remember to comment the podcast and tell me what could be better. Thanks everyone, see you next week. Contact me: freakedoutmatt@gmail.com www.myspace.com/thebestmusicpodcast

item.title: Element Eighty-Slackjaw-Video
item.description: This is February 24, 2006 and the song of the week is Slackjaw by Element Eighty. I hope you enjoy the podcast and I also apologize for not posting a new podcast for a few weeks. Contact me: freakedoutmatt@gmail.com www.myspace.com/thebestmusicpodcast

item.title: Papa Roach-Decompression Period-2-4-06-Video
item.description: This is the video version of this episode. The song of the week is Decompression Period by Papa Roach. You can find this song in Papa Roach's album "Love Hate Tragedy". I hope you guys enjoy the podcast. Contact me: freakedoutmatt@gmail.com

item.title: Skillet-Alien Youth-1-29-06
item.description: This is the first video podcast for The Best Music. I put a music video that I made for the video for the music. The song of the week is "Alien Youth" by Skillet. I hope you guys enjoy it, and please leave me feedback, I want to know what you guys think about the podcast(i.e. what could be better, what is good, etc.) I will also read the emails I get from you guys unless you indicate differently in your email. Thanks everyone. Contact me: freakedoutmatt@gmail.com
item.dc:creator: Matt Schwartz

item.description: This is the first new episode of a 30 second only song clip. I hope you guys enjoy it. Contact me: freakedoutmatt@gmail.com

item.title: Slipknot-Before I Forget-1-22-06
item.description: Alright everyone, this is the edited version of Slipknot-Before I Forget. And again, if you have any suggestions on good songs or would like to leave a comment please do. Also, if you do not like one of the songs please leave a comment and say what kind of songs you do like so that I can remember that in the future and maybe even use one of those songs. Contact me: freakedoutmatt@gmail.com
item.dc:creator: Matt Schwartz
item.itunes:summary:
Alright everyone, this is the edited version of Slipknot-Before I Forget. And again, if you have any suggestions on good songs or would like to leave a comment please do. Also, if you do not like one of the songs please leave a comment and say what kind of songs you do like so that I can remember that in the future and maybe even use one of those songs.
Contact me: freakedoutmatt@gmail.com

item.title: I Can't Get Copyright Permission
item.description: Sorry everyone, but I have to delete the podcast Slipknot-Before I Forget because Roadrunner Records won't allow me to use there music. I have looked at other record studios but they all require a large fee for a one time use, which I cannot afford. I will from now on be doing everything the same thing except I will only have a 30 second or so clip of the songs so I don't get in trouble with the feds. Sorry again everyone, and please do not unsubscribe from The Best Music podcast. Contact Me: freakedoutmatt@gmail.com
